author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students with ‘Neer Kudam’ from seven sub-regions participate in the valedictory session of Water Festival 2016 on Tuesday.— Photo: S.S. Kumar

Banking on children as a catalyst of social change, All for Water for All, a coalition of eight organisations, involved 39 schools in the Water Festival 2016.

The school children took a pledge to conserve water and to foster commitment.

They got the Neer Kudam (copper water pot) from seven sub regions where the water festival was celebrated to Auroville on Tuesday.

The Pondicherry Science Forum organised puppet shows with children from four schools to create awareness on water conservation.
title: Catching them young
